name: Notification for replies (simple)
description: Notify YOUR AGENCY and YOUR CLIENTS about category changes when a lead replies.

name: Notification for replies (client comms)
description: Automation to notify agency and clients of lead category changes, log engaged leads in a sheet, and requires Smartlead client database.

name: Notification for replies (simplest)
description: Automation to notify you of lead category changes, with options for client notifications and analytics.

name: Smartlead client onboarding SOPs
description: Automation to streamline client management by adding client folders, integrating webhooks, and hiding specific categories in Smartlead, with Clay client onboarding recommended.

name: Clay client onboarding SOPs
description: Automation to add a client folder in Clay and link its ID to your PJM tool for future automations, recommended with Smartlead onboarding SOPs..

name: Campaign backups & restore
description: Automation to back up campaign and subsequence sequences for easy restoration and duplication.

name: Duplicate subsequence in Smartlead
description: Automation to duplicate a subsequence or campaign to another for easy replication, adaptable for various databases with Campaign backups required.

name: Add client dropdown field to Hubspot
category: Add client dropdown field to Hubspot
description: Automation to add a Client dropdown field in HubSpot for contacts, companies, and deals, and auto-create a contact list

name: Add BCC address & custom tracking
description: Automation to monitor open tracking and Bcc emails in email accounts, adding missing fields, with optional DNS checks for DMARC and open tracking.

name: Create tasks for calendar events
description: Automation to send a Slack notification for unaccepted calendar events and create a HubSpot task to follow up with leads.

name: Hubspot 2-way sync (Hubspot to smartlead)
description: Automation to sync Smartlead category changes within HubSpot, requiring completed HubSpot and Smartlead properties sync

name: Hubspot 2-way sync (smartlead to hubspot)
description: Automation to sync Smartlead category changes in HubSpot, requiring prior completion of the HubSpot and Smartlead properties sync.

name: Auto-categorize leads with AI
description: Automation to capture new replies in Smartlead and use customizable AI for lead categorization.

name: Notification for 'thread' replies
description: Automation to notify you of new replies in Gmail or Slack threads for quick lead responses, with an optional feature to pause all campaigns upon a lead's reply.

name: Notification for 'thread' replies(client comms)
description: Automation to notify you of new replies in Gmail or Slack threads for prompt lead engagement, with an optional feature to pause all campaigns upon a lead's response

name: Notifications for untracked replies (Step-1)
description: Automation to send Slack notifications for untracked replies and manage a blocklist for domains, emails, and keywords.

name: Notifications for untracked replies(Step-2)
description: Automation to send Slack notifications for untracked replies and facilitate the addition of domains, emails, and keywords to a blocklist.

name: Enrich Smartlead contacts using Clay
description: Automation to enrich Smartlead contacts using Clay with customizable triggers, adaptable for various use cases like adding mobile numbers.

name: Tasks for email disconnects Many Options (tasks and analytics)}
description: Automation to notify you of disconnected email accounts, attempt automatic reconnections via the Smartlead API, and optionally log the accounts, with multiple notification options available.

name: Tasks for email disconnects Simple Version (many options: tasks)
description: If you don't need analytics, use the simple version.

name: Tasks for email disconnects Simplest Version (notifications)
description: If you don't need tasks or analytics, use the simplest version.

name: Send campaign copy to Smartlead
description: Automation to send campaign copy directly to Smartlead for streamlined workflow and management, with options for other platforms like Airtable or Notion.

name: Create copywriting spintax
description: Automation to add Spintax to your email copywriting for dynamic and varied content, adaptable for other platforms like Airtable or Notion.

name: Store OLD engaged leads in Clickup
category: Store OLD engaged leads in Clickup
description: Automation to log old engaged leads in ClickUp for detailed lead tracking and dashboard creation, requiring initial setup of the ClickUp Agency Workspace.

name: Store NEW engaged leads in Clickup
category: Store NEW engaged leads in Clickup
description: Automation to notify your agency and clients about category changes from lead replies, and log new engaged leads in ClickUp for dashboard creation, requiring ClickUp Agency Workspace setup.

name: Sync HubSpot and Smartlead properties (Sync Campaigns)
description: Automation to sync Smartlead properties in HubSpot, with recommendations to leverage client and campaign versions in onboarding SOPs.

name: Sync HubSpot and Smartlead properties (Sync Clients)
description: Automation to sync Smartlead properties in HubSpot, with suggestions to use the Client and Campaign versions for onboarding and monitoring

name: Sync HubSpot and Smartlead properties(Sync Categories)
description: Automation to sync Smartlead properties in HubSpot, with recommendations to use the Client and Campaign versions in onboarding and monitoring processes.

name: Make.com scenario backups
description: Automation to store copies of your Make automations in Google Drive for backup, preventing loss from accidental deletions.

name: Smartlead client database
description: Automation to add and update Smartlead clients in Google Sheets, serving as a reference for future client management automations.

name: Automate responses to OOO emails
description: Automation to respond to out-of-office emails using Smartlead and Clay for timely follow-up and efficient communication.

name: Send Smartlead emails from Slack (Step 1 - Send to Slack)
description: Automation to send new replies to Slack for category changes, capture Slack responses for approval, and send emails to Smartlead contacts for streamlined communication.

description: Automation to send new replies to Slack for category changes, capture Slack responses for approval, and email Smartlead contacts directly from Slack.

name: Send Smartlead emails from Slack(Step 3 - Send to Lead)
description: Automation to notify Slack of new replies for category changes, capture responses for approval, and email Smartlead contacts directly from Slack.

name: Auto-add DKIM, DMARC & open tracking
description: Automation to add DKIM, DMARC, and open tracking settings to GoDaddy for enhanced email authentication and deliverability.

description: Automation to pause campaigns with bounce rates over 3% and notify you, plus Slack alerts for low 'leads not contacted' rates

name: Smartlead calendar sync
description: This automation updates Smartlead categories and pauses leads in campaigns upon booking a meeting, ensuring smooth lead management and organization.

name: Campaign monitoring and database
description: This automation enhances your email campaigns by randomizing sending times for a more human-like approach, notifying you of low lead contacts or high bounce rates via Slack or Gmail, and logging essential statistics in Google Sheets for straightforward reporting

name: Daily Campaign Monitoring
description: This automation optimizes your email campaigns by randomizing the timing of your emails for a more human-like delivery, alerting you via Slack if lead contact rates are low or bounce rates are high, and recording your performance metrics in Google Sheets for easy access and reporting.

name: Automated weekly reports (Slack Version: More Complex (step 1))
description: This automation sends customizable reports to clients on a set schedule and manages follow-up tasks.

description: This automation allows you to send scheduled reports to clients and manage follow-up tasks, utilizing a customizable email template.

name: Automated weekly reports (Clickup Version: More Complex (step 2))
description: This automation sends client reports on a customizable schedule, with one automation for automatic delivery and others for task management.

name: Automated weekly reports (alternatives)
description: This automation sends client reports on a customizable schedule, with one report sent automatically and others set as tasks, using a template from beefree.io and the Smartlead Client Database.

name: Automated weekly reports
description: This automation sends internal reports of your all-time stats in Smartlead on a custom schedule, with customizable email templates from beefree.io and the Smartlead client database.
